title: Johnny Bench The Photographer
description:
Tim Kurkjian and Buster Olney discuss Tim’s induction into the Baseball Hall of Fame, his interactions with other Hall of Famers, the surprise lunch celebration and how many time he practiced his speech. Then, they get into the latest on where Juan Soto may land, and what they think the Guardians, Orioles, White Sox and Red Sox will do at the trade deadline. Later, Sarah Langs stops by to talk about getting emotional celebrating Tim in Cooperstown, Soto’s walks, Aaron Judge’s multi-home run games and this week’s Subway Series. Plus, Tim’s Hall of Fame speech, in its entirety.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Tim Kurkjian and Buster discuss Tim's weekend in Cooperstown being inducted into the Hall of Fame. Plus, what the O's, White Sox, Red Sox and Guardians will do at the deadline. And Sarah Langs plays The Numbers Game
